★★★ 123COM ★★★
www.123com.org - sales@123com.org

WHT Offer: http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1083882
Products Page: http://123com.org/vps/micro
Unmetered VPS: http://123com.org/vps

123COM Ltd has been a well-known UK provider of website hosting since 2007, we have been serving the shared hosting, reseller hosting and server hosting industries for 5 years now, and aim to continue our high-quality services, and exceptional personalised support to all customers.

We are known for going above-and-beyond with our customers to ensure their services are always running at optimum speed and with the service-level the customer expects.

As we have been operating in the more "tailored" high-end market for the past 5 years (when it comes to servers), we feel we are ready from an experience, staffing and infrastructure perspective to successfully offer set plans to the budget end of the market. While our customers can rest-assured that their service needs will always come first.

We are offering OpenVZ solutions in Paris, FR - and in Scranton, USA - we are here to stay.

VPN and Proxy Servers are allowed on our network, open a ticket if you wish to enable TUN/TAP; and we also offer IPv6, again open a ticket if you require more.

Our live support, ticket (& email) support, and telephone support are always available if you have any questions, queries or issues.

Our new range of MicroVPS plans are as follows:

http://123com.org/vps/micro
